entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
